mapper.sql: id, customer_code, customer_type, customer_name, contacts, address, tel, memo, salesman, credit_price, enabled, created_time, updated_time, created_id, updated_id

where.if: and (a.customer_code like '%${q}%' or a.customer_name like '%${q}%' or a.tel like '%${q}%' )

mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.customer_code, a.customer_type, a.customer_name, a.contacts, a.address, a.tel, a.memo, a.salesman, a.credit_price, a.enabled, a.created_time, a.updated_time, a.created_id, a.updated_id, b.customer_name as salesman_name FROM bus_customer a LEFT JOIN bus_customer b ON a.salesman = b.customer_code
select customer_code from bus_customer where customer_type = #{customerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by customer_code desc
mapper.insert: insert into bus_customer (id, customer_code, customer_type, customer_name, contacts, address, tel, memo, salesman, credit_price, enabled, created_time, updated_time, created_id, updated_id ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salesman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creditPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update bus_customer
customer_code = #{customerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
customer_type = #{customerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
customer_name = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contacts = #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
salesman = #{salesman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
credit_price = #{creditPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
created_id = #{createdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updated_id = #{updatedId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update bus_customer set customer_code = #{customerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_type = #{customerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_name = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contacts = #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salesman = #{salesman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, credit_price = #{creditPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_id = #{createdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_id = #{updatedId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
